item.title: Asking for help: methods
item.description:
IRC and asciinema I will usually create a recording of my terminal and ask over IRC. Recordings
<2019-10-30 Wed> #racket 20:03 < libertyprime> hey guys. how would i hide the output of the sexps being evaluated? https://asciinema.org/a/qZolO6uyMFvCma8RvYNI0k9YK I can't wrap in (void (begin ...)) because it will complain 20:04 < libertyprime> http://ix.io/20jR/rkt
